strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_DESC:
The Nemesis Huntress engages against enemies slowly but ruthlessly with ther deadly longbow and double headed hatchet.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Score headshots with Heavy Bolt to maximize damage to foes.

< ! > Make use of your Laser Hatchet and Explosive Bolt to clear crowds effectively and efficiently.

< ! > Blink is an effective tool to quickly relocate and score a clean shot on an enemy.

< ! > It's all about skill.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_OUTRO: ..and so she left, finding a new home far away.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_FAILURE: ..and so she returned, settling down at last.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PASSIVE_DESC: All <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strike Chance</style> is converted into <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strike Damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_BOW_DESC: Hold to charge an arrow for up to <style=cIsDamage>320%</style> damage. Capable of striking <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_ALT_DESC: <style=cIsHealth>WIP.</style> Hold to charge up to <style=cIsDamage>7</style> arrows for <style=cIsDamage>50%</style> damage each.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_DESC: Throw a boomeranging hatchet that pierces enemies for <style=cIsDamage>480%</style> damage.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_SPECIAL_DESC: Replace your next arrow with an <style=cIsDamage>explosive bolt</style>, detonating on impact for <style=cIsDamage>800%</style> damage.
